name: Executive/ Senior Executive (Retail Sales)
responsibilities: Explore new business opportunities & appoint new distributors.
To increase sales of raw chicken and ambient frozen food products.
Achieve monthly and yearly sales target as per annual operation plan of the territory.
skillsNedded: Must be familiar with order collection through multiple e-commerce platforms.

name: Electrical Engineer
responsibilities: Assist in different types of design related works in power & infrastructure sectors.
Commissioning of MV and HV Substations.
Overseeing procurement of Protective relays, transformer, energy meter and automation solutions.
skillsNedded: Bachelor Degree in Electrical/Mechanical Engineering from Public University preferably BUET/CUET/RUET/KUET.
Good knowledge in Electrical and automation software is expected.

name: Civil Engineer (Power plant Project)
responsibilities: Assist the Project Manager/Deputy Project Manager in various assignments.
Commissioning of MV and HV Substations.
Review, comment and approve the engineering design including vendor/supplier drawings by and from the EPC Contractor
Overseeing procurement of Protective relays, transformer, energy meter and automation solutions.
skillsNedded: Bachelor Degree in Electrical/Mechanical Engineering from Public University
Should have prior experience in design review and construction supervision of civil works.
Good knowledge in Electrical and automation software is expected.

name: Executive/ Sr. Executive - Event Management
responsibilities: Event planning, design, budgeting within time limits and organize conferences, seminars and exhibitions etc
Organize facilities and manage all event's details such as decor, catering, entertainment, transportation, location, invitee list, special guests, equipment, promotional material etc.
Attend event to oversee activities and ensure details are handled as planned.
skillsNedded: Experience in event organization or management or related work experience is an added advantage .
Strong communication skills - written and verbal is a must
